name: dallask-all-in-one-code-checker
description: All-in-one code checker with ready configs and scripts: ESLint, StyleLint, Prettier

scripts.postinstall: cp dist/.eslintignore $INIT_CWD && cp dist/.eslintrc.json $INIT_CWD && cp dist/.prettierignore $INIT_CWD && cp dist/.prettierrc.json $INIT_CWD && cp dist/.stylelintignore $INIT_CWD && cp dist/.stylelintrc.json $INIT_CWD && npx npm-add-script -k "stylelint" -v "stylelint '**/*.scss'" -f && npx npm-add-script -k "stylelint:fix" -v "stylelint '**/*.scss' --fix" -f && npx npm-add-script -k "prettier" -v "prettier '**/*' --check" -f && npx npm-add-script -k "prettier:fix" -v "prettier '**/*' --write" -f && npx npm-add-script -k "eslint" -v "eslint '**/*.js'" -f && npx npm-add-script -k "eslint:fix" -v "eslint '**/*.js' --fix" -f
